HAL is in active discussions with IAF to deliver the aircraft at the earliest,” it said in a statement.]]></description><link><![CDATA[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/5-lca-mk1a-fighter-jets-fully-ready-for-delivery-to-iaf-hal/articleshow/127955596.cms]]></link><guid><![CDATA[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/5-lca-mk1a-fighter-jets-fully-ready-for-delivery-to-iaf-hal/articleshow/127955596.cms]]></guid><pubDate>Fri, 06 Feb 2026 03:02:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SURENDRA SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="94132" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-127955760,imgsize-94132.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The India–US trade deal announcement may signal less convergence and more competition.
